TopicTitle: OrbitDriver Warning!: xxx Debris had a NaN Orbit and was removed - what's this ?

Articles.Content:
Recently started experimenting with variable geometry wings by using the Infernal Robotics mod.

Soon got an exotic error and the game keeps crashing on supersonic or near supersonic speeds.


A short excerpt follows: 

[LOG 19:35:41.201] Packing Слеток-30э Debris for orbit
[LOG 19:35:41.201] Packing Слеток-30э Debris for orbit
[LOG 19:35:41.202] Packing Слеток-30э Debris for orbit
[LOG 19:35:41.202] Packing Слеток-30э Debris for orbit
[LOG 19:35:41.225] ObT : NaN
M : NaN
E : NaN
V : NaN
Radius: NaN
vel: [NaN, NaN, NaN]
AN: [0.822710700853175, 0.568460291226817, 0]
period: NaN

[WRN 19:35:41.225] [OrbitDriver Warning!]: Слеток-30э Debris had a NaN Orbit and was removed.
[LOG 19:35:41.225] Слеток-30э Debris Unloaded
[ERR 19:35:41.226] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "Слеток-30э Debris (Unloaded)/model/Squad/Parts/Aero/airplaneFins/Swept(Clone)/swept/sweptCOL"

[ERR 19:35:41.227] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "Слеток-30э Debris (Unloaded)/strutConnector/model/strutConnector/node_collider"

[LOG 19:35:41.227] ObT : NaN
M : NaN
E : NaN
V : NaN
Radius: NaN
vel: [NaN, NaN, NaN]
AN: [0.822710700853175, 0.568460291226817, 0]
period: NaN

[WRN 19:35:41.228] [OrbitDriver Warning!]: Слеток-30э Debris had a NaN Orbit and was removed.
[LOG 19:35:41.228] Слеток-30э Debris Unloaded
[ERR 19:35:41.229] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "Слеток-30э Debris (Unloaded)/model/Squad/Parts/Aero/airplaneFins/Swept(Clone)/swept/sweptCOL"

[ERR 19:35:41.229] Infinity or NaN floating point numbers appear when calculating the transform matrix for a Collider. Scene hierarchy path "Слеток-30э Debris (Unloaded)/strutConnector/model/strutConnector/node_collider"

[LOG 19:35:41.229] ObT : NaN
M : NaN
E : NaN
V : NaN
Radius: NaN
vel: [NaN, NaN, NaN]
AN: [0.822710700853175, 0.568460291226817, 0]
period: NaN

Never met a such condition before 1.1.2

Still unsure if it is related to mods or to the game itself.

yeah, i know what is division to zero. No, i know nothing on OrbitDriver or which debris exactly it is (the debug log is heavily spammed by NullReferenceErrors)

Surprisingly the game leaves no crash log, only a 14 Mb ksp.log

 

The IR is still 2.0.2 because 2.0.4 kills the game more often

 

Does anybody know what is the OrbitDriver and why a simple calculation gives a deadly error?

Edited June 21, 2016 by _Astra_
